name: victoriametrics
description: VictoriaMetrics is a fast, cost-effective time series database and monitoring solution. It can act as Prometheus-compatible storage, supports clustering, and exposes a web UI and HTTP APIs for queries and metrics.

features.title: Prometheus Compatible
features.description: Drop-in replacement for Prometheus with full PromQL query support

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Ingest millions of data points per second with low resource usage

features.title: Cost
features.description: Store metrics efficiently with up to 10x compression compared to Prometheus

features.title: Clustering
features.description: Scale horizontally with built-in clustering for high availability and capacity

features.title: Long
features.description: Retain metrics for years with efficient storage and fast queries

features.title: Promql Queries
features.description: Query metrics using familiar PromQL syntax with extensions for advanced use cases

features.title: Grafana Integration
features.description: Visualize metrics in Grafana using VictoriaMetrics as a data source

features.title: Remote Write
features.description: Accept metrics from Prometheus and other systems via remote write protocol
